actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the withholding of State and city income taxes from the pay of members of the Armed Forces, under the direction and administration of the Internal Revenue Service.

summary.text: Provides for the withholding of State and city income taxes from the pay of members of the Armed Forces, under the direction and administration of the Internal Revenue Service pursuant to agreements entered into between the Secretary of the Treasury and the individual States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the withholding of State and city income taxes from the pay of members of the Armed Forces, under the direction and administration of the Internal Revenue Service.
